name.baseName: East China Rice ; Shanghai Rice Production ; Sterilization
华东水稻; 上海水稻生产;除菌

dataSetInformation.common:generalComment: Referring to the PAS2050 standard and using life cycle assessment methods, the carbon footprint of rice production in Shanghai was assessed.
参照PAS2050规范并结合生命周期评价方法对上海市水稻生产进行了碳足迹评估

technology.technologyDescriptionAndIncludedProcesse: The carbon footprint of rice production was calculated with reference to PAS2050 specification and LCA method. PAS2050 stands for "Publicly Available Specification" (PAS), compiled by the British Standard Institution (BSI). It aims to make clear requirements for the evaluation of greenhouse gas emissions during the life cycle of products and services
主要参照 PAS2050 规范并结合 LCA 方 法进行水稻生产的碳足迹计算。PAS2050 全称“公 众可获 取 的 规 范”( Publicly Available Specification， PAS) ，由英国标准协会( British Standard Institution， BSI) 编制，旨在对产品和服务生命周期内温室气体 排放的评价要求做出明确的规定［19］。
technology.technologicalApplicability: The data set represents the carbon footprint associated with the rice production process in Shanghai, East China, including the sterilization phase. It is relevant for agricultural and environmental analysts monitoring the climate impact of cereal cultivation, specifically rice. This information is critical for manufacturers, agricultural enterprises, and certification bodies working towards sustainable agriculture and aiming to improve practices in rice production.
该数据集代表了华东上海水稻生产过程中的碳足迹，包括除菌阶段。该信息对于监测谷类作物种植，特别是水稻的气候影响的农业和环境分析师来说是相关且重要的。这些信息对于致力于可持续农业并希望改进水稻生产实践的制造商、农业企业和认证机构至关重要。

LCIMethodAndAllocation.deviationsFromLCIMethodApproaches: The carbon footprint calculation of rice production mainly refers to the PAS2050 specification and combines LCA methods. PAS2050, the full name Publicly Available Specification (PAS), the system boundary starts from the production of fertilizers and electricity, and the terminal boundary is the output of agricultural products and pollutants in the crop planting process, that is, there are two production systems, namely, agricultural production system and crop production system.
主要参照PAS2050 规范并结合LCA方法进行水稻生产的碳足迹计算。PAS2050 全称“公众可获取的规范” ( Publicly Available Specification, PAS)

dataSourcesTreatmentAndRepresentativenes.dataSelectionAndCombinationPrinciples: Regarding the carbon footprint of rice, primary activity-level data were collected, which encompassed various field operations, processing and storage activities, further processing and product packaging, as well as greenhouse gas emissions in the field.
水稻碳足迹的初级活动水平数据包括田间各项作业活动, 加工存储各项作业活动、深加工与产品包装以及田间温室气体散逸等活动水平数据。
dataSourcesTreatmentAndRepresentativenes.dataTreatmentAndExtrapolationsPrinciples: Including field operations, rice processing, and greenhouse gas emission detection.
包括田间作业、稻谷加工、温室气体排放检测

referenceToDataSource.common:shortDescription: 曹黎明,李茂柏,王新其,赵志鹏,潘晓华.基于生命周期评价的上海市水稻生产的碳足迹[J].生态学报,2014,34(02):491-499.
曹黎明,李茂柏,王新其,赵志鹏,潘晓华.基于生命周期评价的上海市水稻生产的碳足迹[J].生态学报,2014,34(02):491-499.

dataSourcesTreatmentAndRepresentativenes.useAdviceForDataSet: Users should apply this data to the scope of crop cultivation within the system boundaries specified, which include the production of fertilizers and electricity until the output of agricultural products and pollutants. The data set is intended for carbon footprint assessments and should not be used beyond the agricultural production and crop production systems. It does not account for aspects such as product sales, consumer use, or the disposal and recycling process. Methodological adherence to PAS2050 guidelines and LCA methods is necessary when employing this data set.
用户应将此数据应用于指定系统边界内的农作物种植范围，该范围包括肥料和电力的生产直到农产品和污染物的产出。该数据集用于碳足迹评估，不应用于农业生产和作物生产系统之外。它未考虑产品销售、消费者使用或处置和回收过程等方面。在使用此数据集时，必须严格遵守PAS2050指南和LCA方法论指导。

completeness.common:other: The primary raw materials for rice cultivation include seeds, chemical fertilizers, pesticides, etc., with greenhouse gas emissions during the planting process, agricultural machinery use, and rice processing and storage. This does not include the sale of goods, consumer use, or disposal and recycling.
水稻种植原材料主要有种子、化肥、农药等, 种植过程中温室气体排放、农机使用、稻米加工贮藏等, 没有包括商品销售、消费者使用以及处置、再生利用。

review.common:reviewDetails: Inventory: The internal review was done by several iteration steps concerning raw data validation, raw data documentation, representativity, completeness and consistency of modelling with regard to ISO 14040 and 14044.
清单： 内部审查通过几个迭代步骤完成，涉及原始数据验证、原始数据记录、代表性、完整性、与 ISO 14040 和 14044 有关的建模的一致性。

publicationAndOwnership.common:licenseType: Free of charge for all users and uses
